name: Vertigo (itch) (simiane)
description:
A single or two-player battle to reach the depths of hell… Don’t fall too far off the screen, or get caught at the top. Knock your opponant and enemies off ledges to clear your path….

SURVIVE!!!

Best played with friends… give the 2 player a try. ;)

Play using cursors or WASD for player 1, and Numpad for player 2.
Control pads supported.

Built using Phaser 3, in 72 hours, by StealthGary and Super Hadoken, for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam: 'Deeper & Deeper'

Controls
  • 2-button gamepad support
  • Keyboard:
    • WAD / cursors - Move
    • , or SPACE - Attack
  • Player 2:
    • NUMPAD 486 - Move
    • NUMPAD 0 - Attack
